page.shortlink: form layout data bound field properties control type property
page.description: The control type used to display the data for the field.

discussion.p: The following control types are available for data bound fields:

item.name: Label
item.description: Displays the field using a label control.

item.name: Image-DataBound
item.description: Displays an image. The image name is specified by the value in the field.

description.p: Displays the field value using a switch control which can be used to edit the field's value. The switch control can be customized to display a custom 'on' and 'off' icon rather than the standard 'switch'. You can also define a multi-state switch that allows you to toggle between multiple values.

item.name: Ink-DataBound
item.description: Displays the value of the field rendered as Ink.

item.name: CustomItem
item.description: Displays the field using a user-defined custom item control type.
